channel.title: DataPlat
channel.description: DataPlat 2024 is an international workshop on Data Platform Design, Management, and Optimization, co-located with ICDE 2024. DataPlat is aimed at funneling research efforts addressing different parts of the data management lifecycle towards the development of data platforms (meant as data-intensive ecosystems supporting data scientists and architects at a high level) and fosters innovative research solutions that contribute to further advancements in this field.
